thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 6 of 489
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text: As a new customer, I was unsure exactly how accurate the product description and quality would be. Item was better than I expected, came much sooner than expected, and was less expensive than the lower-quality product I had previously received from a different vendor. As an added bonus, I was able to order a smaller quantity, not the usual minimum order of 1,000 pieces. I'm absolutely delighted with the service and have already recommended this company to others. I will definitely be back! Thank You ClearBags!
